nodes.title: Web-based IT Evironments Automation Platform
nodes.summary: The Ansible Tower's open source edition

product.summary: The Ansible Tower's open source edition
A radically simple IT automation platform

overview.overview: Ansible® delivers simple IT automation that ends repetitive tasks and frees up DevOps teams for more strategic work.

highlights: can be used across entire IT teams from systems and network administrators to developers and managers
Pre-configured, one-click to deploy on Cloud Server
All codes on your server, secure and customizable
Paid image, free professional support for your business

childMarkdownRemark.html: This is a repackaged AWX Project with professional support for your business. AWX Project is an open source community project sponsored by Red Hat®. It enables users to better control their Ansible® project use in IT environments. AWX is the upstream project from which the Red Hat® Ansible® Tower offering is ultimately derived.

faq.value: Yes, it supported Locales. It automatically sets the locale preference based on the user’s browser settings. For Safari, Internet Explorer, and older versions of Chrome as well as FireFox, this is handled automatically.

faq.key: How is AWX connected to PostgreSQL?
faq.value: AWX connect PostgreSQL in Docker inner, and you can use external Database
